deals.title: Original Buffalo Wings
deals.itemDescription: Heat level: MILD. A rich + tangy combo of cayenne, vinegar and real butter. It's a fan favorite for a reason! Hot Ones™ Original Buffalo sauce tossed with your choice of wings. Bone-in contains milk. Boneless contains milk, wheat (gluten). Plant-Based contains milk, tree nuts (coconut), wheat (gluten).
